Articles.Content:
Hello,

I recently started to make a U-boat.  It has 279 parts, but is not completely finished.  I haven't completed the interior or the diving mechanism.  However, it has a fully operational weapons system.  I want you guys to work on it and show off what you did with it.  Kinda like a pass-and-play system.

Screenies!

http://imgur.com/a/Ecm7d

Craft File!

https://kerbalx.com/crafts/17695

Warning:  You will need Tweakscale, FSFuelSwitch, NAS, BD Armory, Vesselmover, B9 Aerospace, and LackLusterLabs.
